TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TraceSource extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一组方法和属性，利用这些方法和属性，应用程序可以跟踪代码的执行并将跟踪消息和它们的源关联起来。

span.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that enable applications to trace the execution of code and associate trace messages with their source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由应用程序用来生成可与应用程序相关联的跟踪。The class is used by applications to produce traces that can be associated with the application. 提供了一些跟踪方法，利用这些跟踪方法，你可以方便地跟踪事件，跟踪数据和发出信息跟踪。 provides tracing methods that allow you to easily trace events, trace data, and issue informational traces. 可以通过配置文件设置控制 的跟踪输出。Trace output from can be controlled by configuration file settings. 配置文件位于具有应用程序可执行文件的文件夹中，并具有添加了 .config 文件扩展名的应用程序的名称。The configuration file is located in the folder with the application executable and has the name of the application with the .config file name extension added. 例如，"TraceSourceSample" 的配置文件的名称为 "TraceSourceSample"。配置文件可用于确定要将跟踪信息发送到的位置以及要跟踪的活动级别。For example, the name of the configuration file for TraceSourceSample.exe is TraceSourceSample.exe.config. The configuration file can be used to determine where the trace information is to be sent and what levels of activity are to be traced. 下面的示例显示示例应用程序配置文件的内容。The following example shows the contents of a sample application configuration file. ```xml ``` 类由源的名称标识，通常为应用程序的名称。The class is identified by the name of a source, typically the name of the application. 来自特定组件的跟踪消息可以由特定跟踪源启动，从而可以轻松地识别来自该组件的所有消息。The trace messages coming from a particular component can be initiated by a particular trace source, allowing all messages coming from that component to be easily identified. 定义跟踪方法，但实际上并不提供用于生成和存储跟踪数据的任何特定机制。 defines tracing methods but does not actually provide any specific mechanism for generating and storing tracing data. 跟踪数据由跟踪侦听器生成，跟踪侦听器是可以通过跟踪源加载的插件。The tracing data is produced by trace listeners, which are plug-ins that can be loaded by trace sources. > [!NOTE] > 不应在终止过程中调用跟踪方法。You should not call the tracing methods during finalization. 这样做可能导致引发 。Doing so can result in an being thrown. 您可以通过在 属性中存储的集合中添加或删除 实例，自定义跟踪输出的目标。You can customize the tracing output's target by adding or removing instances to or from the collection stored in the property. 默认情况下，使用 类的实例生成跟踪输出。By default, trace output is produced using an instance of the class. 前面的配置文件示例演示如何删除 ，并添加 以生成跟踪源的跟踪输出。The preceding configuration file example demonstrates removing the and adding a to produce the trace output for the trace source. 有关详细信息，请参阅[<侦听器>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/listeners-element-for-source.md)和[<sharedListeners>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/sharedlisteners-element.md)。For more information, see [<listeners>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/listeners-element-for-source.md) and [<sharedListeners>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/sharedlisteners-element.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果跟踪侦听器使用的资源不可用，则在跟踪时将跟踪侦听器添加到 集合可能导致引发异常。Adding a trace listener to the collection can cause an exception to be thrown while tracing, if a resource used by the trace listener is not available. 条件和引发的异常依赖于跟踪侦听器，在本主题中无法枚举。The conditions and the exception thrown depend on the trace listener and cannot be enumerated in this topic. 将对 方法的调用放在 `try`/`catch` 块以检测和处理跟踪侦听器中的任何异常时，可能会很有用。It may be useful to place calls to the methods in `try`/`catch` blocks to detect and handle any exceptions from trace listeners. 类提供动态控制跟踪输出的方法。The class provides the means to dynamically control the tracing output. 前面的配置文件示例演示了如何从跟踪源关闭跟踪并控制跟踪发生的级别。The preceding configuration file example shows how you can turn off tracing from a trace source and control the level at which tracing occurs. 您可以修改源开关的值，而无需重新编译应用程序。You can modify the value of the source switch without recompiling your application. 有关使用配置文件设置开关的信息，请参阅 和[如何：创建、初始化和配置跟踪开关](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md)。For information on using the configuration file to set a switch, see and [How to: Create, Initialize and Configure Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果在应用程序执行时修改配置文件，则必须停止并重新启动该应用程序，或者必须调用 方法才能使新设置生效。If you modify a configuration file while an application is executing, the application must be stopped and restarted or the method must be called before the new settings take effect. 枚举用于定义跟踪消息的事件类型。The enumeration is used to define the event type of the trace message. 跟踪筛选器使用 来确定跟踪侦听器是否应生成跟踪消息。Trace filters use the to determine if a trace listener should produce the trace message. 跟踪侦听器可以选择通过跟踪筛选器额外进行筛选。The trace listeners can optionally have an additional layer of filtering through a trace filter. 如果跟踪侦听器具有关联的筛选器，则侦听器将对该筛选器调用 方法，以确定是否生成跟踪信息。If a trace listener has an associated filter, the listener calls the method on that filter to determine whether or not to produce the trace information. 跟踪侦听器使用 类属性的值 、和 来设置跟踪输出的格式。The trace listeners use the values of the class properties , , and to format trace output. 您可以使用配置文件属性设置 、和 属性。You can use configuration file attributes to set the , , and properties. 下面的示例将 属性设置为 `false`，将 属性设置为3。The following example sets the property to `false` and the property to 3. ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类将跟踪转发到侦听器。The following code example shows the use of the class to forward traces to listeners. 该示例还演示了开关和筛选器的用法。The example also demonstrates switch and filter usage. [!code-cpp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CPP/tracesource2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 源名称用于标识跟踪。The source name is used to identify traces. 使用它来确定跟踪侦听器是否应生成跟踪。It is used by a to determine whether a trace listener should produce the trace. 建议的做法是使用应用程序的名称作为源名称。The recommended practice is to use the name of the application for the source name. > [!NOTE] > 不需要为每个跟踪请求创建新的 实例。It is not necessary to create a new instance for each trace request. 创建一个 实例，并将其用于应用程序的所有跟踪请求。Create one instance and use it for all trace requests for the application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数创建新的 对象。The following code example shows the use of the constructor to create a new object. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 源名称用于标识跟踪。The source name is used to identify traces. 它可由 用来确定是否发生跟踪以及是否由 确定是否生成跟踪。It can be used by a to determine if tracing is to occur and by a to determine whether to produce the trace. 使用默认源级别来确定是否基于要跟踪的消息的源级别进行跟踪。The default source level is used by an to determine if tracing is to occur based on the source level of the message to be traced. > [!NOTE] > 不需要为每个跟踪请求创建新的 实例。It is not necessary to create a new instance for each trace request. 创建一个 实例，并将其用于应用程序的所有跟踪请求。Create one instance and use it for all trace requests for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识应用程序的配置文件中引用的自定义属性。The property identifies the custom attributes referenced in the application's configuration file. 未引用的自定义特性不会被枚举。Unreferenced custom attributes are not enumerated. 从 类继承的类可以通过重写 方法并返回自定义特性名称的字符串数组，来添加自定义特性。Classes that inherit from the class can add custom attributes by overriding the method and returning a string array of custom attribute names. 下面是一个用于指定自定义属性 `SecondTraceSourceAttribute`的 trace source 元素的示例：The following is a sample of a trace source element specifying the custom attribute `SecondTraceSourceAttribute`: ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示 的自定义属性。The following code sample shows how to display the custom attributes for a . 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置源开关的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the source switch value.

value.span: 表示源开关值的 对象。

span.span: A object representing the source switch value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许在跟踪源调用侦听器之前筛选消息。The property allows the filtering of messages before the trace source calls the listeners. 开关用于检查是否应生成或忽略跟踪调用。The switch is used to check whether trace calls should be generated or ignored. 每个跟踪方法调用 的 方法来确定是否继续跟踪。Each trace method calls the method of the to determine whether to proceed with the trace. 如果调用返回 `true`，则调用侦听器。If the call returns `true`, the listeners are called.

span.span: is set to .

summary.span: 使用指定的事件类型、事件标识符和跟踪数据，将跟踪数据写入 集合中的跟踪侦听器中。

span.span: Writes trace data to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified event type, event identifier, and trace data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法（如 方法）用于自动工具，但它还允许将其他对象（如异常实例）附加到跟踪。The method, like the method, is intended for automated tools, but it also allows the attaching of an additional object, such as an exception instance, to the trace. 方法调用 属性返回的 对象的 方法。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果 返回 `true`， 将对所有侦听器调用相应的 方法。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method on all listeners. 否则， 返回，而不调用侦听器的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. > [!NOTE] > 对象限制为最大 `id` 值65535。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果指定的 `id` 值大于65535，则 对象将使用65535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the object uses 65,535. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来筛选跟踪消息并将其转发到侦听器。The following code example shows the use of the method to filter and forward a trace message to the listeners. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#28)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#28)]

summary.span: 使用指定的事件类型、事件标识符和跟踪数据数组，将跟踪数据写入 集合中的跟踪侦听器中。

span.span: Writes trace data to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified event type, event identifier, and trace data array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法（如 方法）用于自动工具，但它还允许将其他对象（如异常实例和堆栈跟踪）附加到跟踪。The method, like the method, is intended for automated tools, but it also allows the attaching of additional objects, such as an exception instance and a stack trace, to the trace. 方法调用 属性返回的 对象的 方法。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果 返回 `true`， 将对所有侦听器调用相应的 方法。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method on all listeners. 否则， 返回，而不调用侦听器的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. > [!NOTE] > 对象限制为最大 `id` 值65535。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果指定的 `id` 值大于65535，则 对象将使用65535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the object uses 65,535.

exception.span: 终止期间尝试跟踪事件。

span.span: An attempt was made to trace an event during finalization.

summary.span: 将跟踪事件消息写入 集合中的跟踪侦听器中。

span.span: Writes a trace event message to the trace listeners in the collection.

summary.span: 使用指定的事件类型和事件标识符，将跟踪事件消息写入 集合中的跟踪侦听器中。

span.span: Writes a trace event message to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified event type and event identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法旨在跟踪工具可自动处理的事件。The method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools. 例如，如果特定的事件由特定的源跟踪，监视工具可以通知管理员。For example, a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source. 方法调用 属性返回的 对象的 方法。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果 返回 `true`， 将调用每个侦听器的相应 方法。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method of each listener. 否则， 返回，而不调用侦听器的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. 跟踪内容是侦听器特定的。The trace content is listener specific. 如果侦听器实现未重写此方法，则默认输出为跟踪源的名称、其数值标识和事件类型。If the method is not overridden by the listener implementation, the default output is the name of the trace source, its numeric identity, and the event type. 其他跟踪内容依赖于侦听器的 属性值。Additional trace content is dependent upon the listener's property value. > [!NOTE] > 对象限制为最大 `id` 值65535。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果指定的 `id` 值大于65535，则 使用65535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the uses 65,535. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法将跟踪事件传递给侦听器。The following code example shows the use of the method to pass a trace event to the listeners. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#17)]

span.span: An attempt was made to trace an event during finalization.

span.span: Writes a trace event message to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified event type, event identifier, and message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法旨在跟踪工具可自动处理的事件。The method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools. 例如，如果特定的事件由特定的源跟踪，监视工具可以通知管理员。For example, a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source. 方法调用 属性返回的 对象的 方法。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果 返回 `true`， 将调用每个侦听器的相应 方法。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method of each listener. 否则， 返回，而不调用侦听器的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. 跟踪内容是侦听器特定的。The trace content is listener specific. 如果侦听器实现未重写此方法，则默认输出为跟踪源的名称、其数字标识、事件类型和消息。If the method is not overridden by the listener implementation, the default output is the name of the trace source, its numeric identity, the event type, and the message. 其他跟踪内容依赖于侦听器的 属性值。Additional trace content is dependent upon the listener's property value. > [!NOTE] > 对象限制为最大 `id` 值65535。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果指定的 `id` 值大于65535，则 对象将使用65535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the object uses 65,535. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法将跟踪事件传递给侦听器。The following code example shows the use of the method to pass a trace event to the listeners. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 使用指定的事件类型、事件标识符以及自变量数组和格式，将跟踪事件写入 集合中的跟踪侦听器中。

span.span: Writes a trace event to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified event type, event identifier, and argument array and format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 `format` 参数的详细信息，请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the `format` parameter, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). 方法旨在跟踪工具可自动处理的事件。The method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools. 例如，如果特定的事件由特定的源跟踪，监视工具可以通知管理员。For example, a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source. 方法调用 属性返回的 对象的 方法。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果 返回 `true`， 将调用每个侦听器的相应 方法。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method of each listener. 否则， 返回，而不调用侦听器的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. 跟踪内容是侦听器特定的。The trace content is listener specific. 默认 方法将源名称、事件类型和数字标识写入跟踪标头中，然后调用 方法，同时传递 `format` 字符串和 `args` 数组，并使用 属性将字符串设置为消息输出格式。The default method writes the source name, event type, and numeric identity in the trace header, then calls the method, passing the `format` string and `args` array and using the property to format the string as the message output. > [!NOTE] > 对象限制为最大 `id` 值65535。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果指定的 `id` 值大于65535，则 对象将使用65535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the object uses 65,535. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法将跟踪事件传递给侦听器。The following code example shows the use of the method to pass a trace event to the listeners. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#24)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#24)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供一条信息性消息，该消息应由用户读取，而不是由工具读取。The method provides an informational message intended to be read by users and not by tools. 调用 方法，将 `eventType` 设置为 并将信息性消息传递为消息字符串。 calls the method, setting `eventType` to and passing the informative message as the message string. 方法又调用每个跟踪侦听器的 方法。The method in turn calls the method of each trace listener.

MemberSignature.Value: public void TraceTransfer (int id, string message, Guid relatedActivityId);
.method public hidebysig instance void TraceTransfer(int32 id, string message, valuetype System.Guid relatedActivityId) cil managed
Public Sub TraceTransfer (id As Integer, message As String, relatedActivityId As Guid)
public: void TraceTransfer(int id, System::String ^ message, Guid relatedActivityId);
member this.TraceTransfer : int * string * Guid -> unit

param.name: id
param.span: 事件的数值标识符。

span.span: A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: message
param.span: 要写入的跟踪消息。

span.span: The trace message to write.

param.name: relatedActivityId
param.span: 标识相关活动的结构。

span.span: A structure that identifies the related activity.

summary.span: 使用指定的数字标识符、消息和相关活动标识符，将跟踪传输消息写入 集合的跟踪侦听器中。

span.span: Writes a trace transfer message to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified numeric identifier, message, and related activity identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用 属性中每个跟踪侦听器的 方法来写入跟踪信息。The method calls the method of each trace listener in the property to write the trace information. 基 类中的默认 方法调用 方法来处理调用，将 `eventType` 设置为 并将 `relatedActivityId` GUID 的字符串表示形式追加到 `message`。The default method in the base class calls the method to process the call, setting `eventType` to and appending a string representation of the `relatedActivityId` GUID to `message`. 旨在与 的逻辑操作一起使用。 is intended to be used with the logical operations of a . `relatedActivityId` 参数与 对象的 属性相关。The `relatedActivityId` parameter relates to the property of a object. 如果逻辑操作在一个活动中开始，并传输到另一个活动，则第二个活动会通过调用 方法来记录传输。If a logical operation begins in one activity and transfers to another, the second activity logs the transfer by calling the method. 调用将新的活动标识与以前的标识相关联。The call relates the new activity identity to the previous identity. 此功能的最可能使用者是跟踪查看器，它可以报告跨多个活动的逻辑操作。The most likely consumer of this functionality is a trace viewer that can report logical operations that span multiple activities.
